title: Lynda - Easy PHP Projects: Single-Serving Sites
description:
Lynda - Easy PHP Projects: Single-Serving Sites

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

3h 1m Beginner Dec 15, 2015   | Uploaded in Dec 22, 2015 by 2boweb

Subjects: Developer Web 
Software: PHP 
Author: Kevin Skoglund 

Sometimes simple websites are more effective than complex ones. In this course, discover the beauty and power of single-serving sites. Easy PHP Projects is a series of small-scale PHP projects targeted at PHP beginners as well as experienced developers looking to practice their skills. Each of the projects in this installment results in a stand-alone, single-page website. Kevin Skoglund shows how to determine a user's IP address and browser details, parse and compare dates, generate dynamic page styles, and create sentences from randomized fragments.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Finding and validating an IP address with PHP
	â€¢	Parsing the HTTP request for browser details
	â€¢	Comparing dates and times in PHP
	â€¢	Randomizing data with PHP
	â€¢	Styling page content dynamically
	â€¢	Generating random sentences
